content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates; contains 48 units of iron ore and is currently without fuel (NO_FUEL).
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates; fueled with 2 units of coal, has produced 6 copper plates at 1600.0 energy, and is waiting for ingredients (NO_INGREDIENTS).

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing “automation” research with input {automation-science-pack: 10} and status NO_POWER.
- ElectricityGroup with id=13312 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) with warnings “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections” (status NOT_CONNECTED).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with a fluid box holding ~199.97 units of water at 15°C and warnings “out of fuel” (NO_FUEL); connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); assigned fluid_system [49988].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with a fluid box holding ~99.85 units of water at 15°C, status WORKING; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); using fluid_system [49988].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=49988 at position(-6.5, 20.5) [WORKING].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=49989 at position(-2.5, 20.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=49990 at position(-0.5, 21.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=49995 at position(-3.5, 23.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=49994 at position(-7.5, 25.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=49999 at position(3.5, 25.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=49998 at position(2.5, 24.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50001 at position(-0.5, 28.5) [EMPTY].
- ElectricityGroup with id=13312 connecting associated electric poles.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Pipeline Connection Issues:
  • Repeated pipeline connection attempts using fluid_system identifiers (49300, 49343, 49386, 49429, 49472, 49515, 49558, 49601, 49644, 49687, 49730, 49773, 49816, 49859, 49902, 49945) failed to locate a working PipeGroup.
  • Tip: Dynamically verify and retrieve active fluid_system identifiers from the pipeline network to ensure correct matching between boiler output and available PipeGroups; avoid hardcoded assumptions.
- Fuel Supply Oversight:
  • The boiler persists in a no-fuel state, preventing efficient steam generation.
  • Tip: Continuously monitor and replenish boiler fuel to maintain proper operational performance.
